annotation.spannedText: Teach your child compassion, and teach your child a sense of responsibility for those around them

classMention.mentionClass: Teach your child compassion, and teach your child a sense of responsibility for those around them

annotation.spannedText: Don’t teach your child to be self serving and scared of the world in which it lives and the people around him/her

classMention.mentionClass: Don’t teach your child to be self serving and scared of the world in which it lives and the people around him/her

annotation.spannedText: teach them to LOVE people with ASD or any other disability for that matter, not to label them as damaged

classMention.mentionClass: teach them to LOVE people with ASD or any other disability for that matter, not to label them as damaged

annotation.spannedText: knowingly exposing your child to childhood illnesses is cruel

classMention.mentionClass: knowingly exposing your child to childhood illnesses is cruel

annotation.spannedText: You couldn’t do it without us pro-vaxxers

classMention.mentionClass: You couldn’t do it without us pro-vaxxers

annotation.spannedText: Those of you who have avoided childhood illnesses without vaccines are lucky

classMention.mentionClass: Those of you who have avoided childhood illnesses without vaccines are lucky

annotation.spannedText: Once the vaccination rates begin dropping, the less herd immunity will be able to protect your children

classMention.mentionClass: Once the vaccination rates begin dropping, the less herd immunity will be able to protect your children

annotation.spannedText: The more people you convert to your anti-vax stance, the quicker that luck will run out

classMention.mentionClass: The more people you convert to your anti-vax stance, the quicker that luck will run out
